channel.title: Lil_Smok3r's Character Progression Thread!
channel.description:
Haven't played RS in so long; recently heard that OSRS is open to F2P so I decided to give it a go. Anyone have any tips to make money/level up?
[b]Current state:[/b] [i]Fishing![/i] Also, if you'd like to play with me and a few other people; just message me your IGN or even leave it in the comments!
[spoiler= Update 1:]Played with Mr.Draconian; levelled up to 30 strength, 11 prayer, 14 defence, 20 attack and 24 hp. [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/svqcqs.png[/img] [/spoiler] [spoiler= Update 2:]Just some more levelling up and a few quests! [b]STILL NOT ALLOWED TO USE GE OR TRADE![/b] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/hsq15x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/mkui3n.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler= Update 3:]Finally allowed to receive items + use the grand exchange! Did some more training, and a bit of skilling too. No questing however. If anyone can recommend good places to train; that'd be amazing!
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/9rukpe.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler= Update 4:]Alright, fishing time! Got my combat skills a bit higher too. Now it's time for the money grind.. [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/35cefjo.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler= Update 5: 10/08/15] Just a minor amount of firemaking, woodcutting and cooking. Also donated some money and armour to a few poor players :) [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/fp6rtk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/zojqfo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/90wn84.png[/img] [/spoiler]

drubrkletern:

8/8 m8

Should put the dates on when you take the pictures, it’d help… <3
[/quote]
Yeah I’m going to start doing that now xD
Sorry for no updates in a while, computer was broken The OSRS grind is back on!
edit: oh shit, new computer means I can’t access the AuthApp that I had on my computer to login :palm:
Am I totally screwed?
edit2: nevermind, fixed it[/quote]

I should brake my computer now, My computer is 7 years old :palm: :mad:

item.title: Lil_Smok3r's Character Progression Thread!
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Draconian Mr.Draconian
item.description:
@Mr.Draconian wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:550393”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=669304.msg4475648#msg4475648 date=1425729477]
Haven’t played RS in so long; recently heard that OSRS is open to F2P so I decided to give it a go. Anyone have any tips to make money/level up?
[/quote]
Buy bonds and buy spins. You’ll get both.

[hr]
For real though: Bossing, slayer, resource skills (mining, fishing, wc), the normal for money making.

Leveling now is easier than ever. Slayer is best for combat leveling imo, and skilling it depends per skill[/quote]

Or winning in an event

Read full topic

item.title: Lil_Smok3r's Character Progression Thread!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Lil_Smok3r:

Haven’t played RS in so long; recently heard that OSRS is open to F2P so I decided to give it a go. Anyone have any tips to make money/level up?

Buy bonds and buy spins. You’ll get both.

[hr]
For real though: Bossing, slayer, resource skills (mining, fishing, wc), the normal for money making.

Leveling now is easier than ever. Slayer is best for combat leveling imo, and skilling it depends per skill

Read full topic
